name: nativescript-parallax

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo &&  cd demo &&  tns emulate ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo &&  cd demo &&  tns run android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build &&  cd demo &&  tns plugin remove nativescript-parallax &&  tns plugin add .. &&  tns install
scripts.setup: cd demo &&  npm install &&  cd .. &&  npm run build &&  cd demo &&  tns plugin add .. &&  cd ..

readme:
#NativeScript Parallax Plugin.

Now it's working, documentation coming super soon. for the time being check out main-page.xml and app.css under the demo folder for and example.
